mapper.insert: insert into aim_reply(board_no, member_no, content) values(#{boardNo}, #{writerNo}, #{content})
mapper.select: select r.reply_no, r.board_no, r.member_no, r.content, r.write_dt, m.name, m.filename from aim_reply r inner join aim_member m on m.member_no = r.member_no where r.board_no=#{no} ORDER BY r.reply_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from aim_like_reply where member_no=#{memberNo} and reply_No=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: select count(reply_no) from aim_like_reply where member_no=#{memberNo} and reply_no=#{replyNo}
